attributes.action: Actually spend the Vehicle Excise Duty on the road network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, like many others, am completely fed up of having to drive on poorly maintained roads.  It is a national disgrace to have to pay so much tax and in return drive on roads which are no better than third world cart tracks.  John Prescott bragged over ten years ago that we would have a transport network the envy of the world, it is now the laughing stock of the world.  You have our money now put it where your mouth was.
